wikipedia_page.main: David John Drewry (born 22 September 1947, in Grimsby) is a glaciologist and geophysicist who was described in the conferring of an honorary degree by Anglia Ruskin University in 1998 as having an "outstanding reputation as an eminent scientist of international repute". Drewry has also received several awards for his work. Since 1 July 2015 he is the Vice-President of the European University Association.

response: *  1947   – David Drewry, English glaciologist and geophysicist
* Prof David Drewry, Vice-Chancellor from 1999-2009 of the University of Hull
